translation.WELCOME: Welcome to foodpedia, tell me your preferred location to search for best Restaurant.
translation.GOODBYE_NOT_LINKED: ThankQ very much for using the foodpedia.
translation.FOUND_MORE_RES: I've found {{n_restaurants}} restaurants, for {{search_term}}. First up is {{res_name}}. Say 'Hear the details' to listen the details, or say 'next' to the next best restaurant?
translation.HEAR_DETAILS: Here we go. This restaurant has {{rating}} rating, and {{rcount}} reviews. Say 'more' to get more details, or begin a new search.
translation.A_MORE_DETAILS: OK. Here are the few more details. It is located at <say-as interpret-as='address'>{{postcode}} </say-as> postcode. <say-as interpret-as='telephone'> {{cnumber}} </say-as> is the contact number. Would you like to hear it again? or find another restaurant.
translation.NA_MORE_DETAILS: OK. Here are the more details. It is located at {{postcode}} postcode and {{cnumber}} is the contact number. I've send that details to your Alexa app. Would you like to hear it again? or go for next restaurant.
translation.GO_FOR_NEXT_RES: OK. Say another restaurant to hear the details or Say goodbye to close this skill.
translation.YES_MORE_DETAILS: <say-as interpret-as='telephone'> {{cnumber}} </say-as> is the contact number. And it is located at <say-as interpret-as='address'>{{address}}</say-as> is the postcode. Say 'new search' to start a new search.
translation.LOCATION_RES_SEARCH: I've found {{n_restaurants}} {{word}} in {{sLoc}}. Now,tell me the recipe name, for a best restaurant match.
translation.NO_RES_LOCATION: I'm sorry, I did not find any restaurants at {{sLoc}}.
translation.NEXT_RES: OK, How about {{r_name}} ?. Say 'Hear the details' to listen the details, or say 'next' to the next best restaurant?
translation.EXCEED_POP_RES: Those are the top 5 best restaurants, I found at this moment. Please do account linking, to receive the next 5 best restaurants through email. Say 'new search' to start a new search.
translation.SEARCH_WELCOME: OK, tell me your preferred location to begin a new search.
translation.SORRY_NO_RES_FOUND: Sorry, I did not find any restaurants which serve {{r_name}} in {{loc}}. Begin a new search with change in location or recipe.
translation.R_FOUND_L_NOT_FOUND: OK, I got your recipe {{r_name}} , now tell me your preferred location to search for best restaurant.
translation.EXCEED_SEARCHES: Thankq for using the skill. I will come back with better search results on next invocation.
translation.HELP_MSG: This skill gives you the best restaurants based on your preferred location and recipe, say 'Alexa, open foodpedia' to start using this skill.
